resources.string: Hello kind traveller! Come, come, sit here, don\'t be shy. What\'s your name?
Good, good, it\'s nice to meet you. What would you like to drink?
Hmm that\s certainly an.., interesting choice. Just give me a minute.., Here you are. Oh, I see you have a symbol of a creature on your tunic. What is it?
Oh I see, that means that you\'re from that favourite family, that has this motto..,
Yes, that\'s a really famous motto.. But I still don\t remember the name of your house. Tell me, is your family currently rulling Westeros?
No, but we have in the past
Oh, I remember now! Click the button below to find out!
